channel.title: CVE Feed for WpDevArt -- Countdown and CountUp, WooCommerce Sales Timers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WpDevArt -- Countdown and CountUp, WooCommerce Sales Timers

item.title: CVE-2021-34636|2024-08-04T00:19:47.639Z -- wpdevart -- countdown%20and%20countup%2C%20woocommerce%20sales%20timers
item.description: The Countdown and CountUp, WooCommerce Sales Timers WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery via the save_theme function found in the ~/includes/admin/coundown_theme_page.php file due to a missing nonce check which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.5.7.
